=== How to create a Mactel wiki ===

==== Creating a new page ====
<nowiki>[[File:IconUsers.png]]</nowiki><<BR>>  '''Please note:'''
A wiki about a certain Mac hardware belongs into the community help pages (help.ubuntu.com), not
into the team wiki (wiki.ubuntu.com). <<BR>>
If you like to create such a wiki, do the following steps:<<BR>>
* Right click, open in new tab and login at <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/|help.ubuntu.com/community/]]</nowiki>
* Create a new page: Right click and open in new tab <<BR>> <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/MacBook1-1/UbuntuVersion|help.ubuntu.com/community/MacBook1-1/UbuntuVersion]]</nowiki><<BR>><nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/MacBook2-1/UbuntuVersion|help.ubuntu.com/community/MacBook2-1/UbuntuVersion]]</nowiki><<BR>><nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/MacBook3-1/UbuntuVersion|help.ubuntu.com/community/MacBook3-1/UbuntuVersion]]</nowiki><<BR>><nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/MacBook4-1/UbuntuVersion|help.ubuntu.com/community/MacBook4-1/UbuntuVersion]]</nowiki><<BR>><nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/MacBook5-1/UbuntuVersion|help.ubuntu.com/community/MacBook5-1/UbuntuVersion]]</nowiki><<BR>><nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/MacBookPro1-1/UbuntuVersion|help.ubuntu.com/community/MacBookPro1-1/UbuntuVersion]]</nowiki><<BR>><nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/MacBookPro2-1/UbuntuVersion|help.ubuntu.com/community/MacBookPro2-1/UbuntuVersion]]</nowiki><<BR>><nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/MacBookPro3-1/UbuntuVersion|help.ubuntu.com/community/MacBookPro3-1/UbuntuVersion]]</nowiki><<BR>><nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/MacBookPro4-1/UbuntuVersion /community/xServe2-1/UbuntuVersion|help.ubuntu.com/community/xServe2-1/UbuntuVersion]]</nowiki><<BR>>
* Adjust the Ubuntu version in the browser URL. Use  only the first word of the version name with a capital letter at the beginning: <<BR>> '''Example''': Mac``Book Air 1,1 and Ubuntu 8.10 (Intrepid Ibex) will be located at <<BR>> <<BR>><nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/MacBookAir1-1/Intrepid|help.ubuntu.com/community/MacBookAir1-1/Intrepid]]</nowiki><<BR>><<BR>>
* Choose <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/MactelSupportTeam/DocTemplate|MactelSupportTeam/DocTemplate]]</nowiki> as template for your wiki.

Thank you for using the Mactel documentation template!

==== Documentation Guidelines ====

Please also have a look at our <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/MactelSupportTeam/DocGuidlines|guidelines for writing documentation]]</nowiki>!<<BR>><<BR>>
The guidelines contain a lot of DOs and DONTs. See it as recommendations. <<BR>>
All wikis for running Ubuntu on a Mac reside in the user community pages <<BR>>
and everybody is free to contribute to them. <<BR>><<BR>>
The '''MactelSupportTeam''' tries to improve the overall comprehensibility of these documents.
